content: any worsted yarn will do hobby lobby s i love this yarn is perfect in texture and size but i couldn t find all the colors i wanted i noticed that vanna yarn did though i used some old berella worsted scraps for my inner colors along with white hl because of how soft it is this is a super easy pattern worked in all double_crochet s you could just as easily knit it in garter stitch instead if you prefer i love the idea that was posted in comments how about making scaled-down versions for kids maki hehe
